title: Interactive Exercise: Build a Password Validator
description:
Create a password validator that raises custom exceptions for different validation failures:

**Requirements:**
- Password must be at least 8 characters → raise TooShortError
- Password must contain at least one digit → raise NoDigitError  
- Password must contain at least one uppercase letter → raise NoUppercaseError
- If all validations pass, return True

**Your task:**
1. Create three custom exception classes
2. Create a validate_password() function
3. Raise appropriate exceptions when validation fails
4. Test with various passwords
